content: समादा {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To take, receive, accept. {@--2@} To take hold of, seize, grasp. {@--3@} To bestow, give, present. {@--4@} To restore, return. {@--5@} To take off or away. {@--6@} To apprehend, comprehend. {@--7@} To undertake, begin. {@--8@} To collect. {@--9@} To think about, reflect on.
